title: About mastery at end of game screen...
body: Whenever i exit the end of game screen i hear the mastery bar glitching out and making such annoying noises and make me have to restart league i would really like it if riot fixes this because my ears are literally breaking apart ;n;{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3184}}

replies.body: Do a repair on your installation, this is not typical.
